title: Cool
comment: Amazing concept, I love it

title: Great response from staff
comment: Update (1 star to 4):  The staff responded quickly and fixed the crashing problem.  Now I Just have to figure out how to use it.  Previous review: Read good things about it, but I can't try it if it keeps closing/crashing. Read the previous reviews.  I'm having the same problem on my s4 Zoom
The new version (1.0.3) should fix this crashes, please try it, we just released it.
Great idea

title: Exciting project
comment: Crashes fixed for me, thank you. Now I'm just waiting to see the project grow :-)
The new version (1.0.3) should fix this crashes, please try it, we just released it.

title: Cool
comment: Awesome browser. I hope it competes with Google one day...

title: Good idea but  crashes
comment: I think the search engine is a nice idea but every time I open it to search it crashes. Update :It no longer crashes and I like it. But there's no widget :(

We have jut updated the app to version 1.0.3 and this should fix the crashes, can you please try it again?
Thank you!

title: It's a start,a good start
comment: Dominoogle had a first day too and look at it now. The world will turn on, and then turn off dominoogle soon let's hope. They've brought some incredible innovation but at what cost?

title: I love it.
comment: Its an amazing concept and works awesomely on my Atrix. I can't wait to see this grow and become one of the big players!

title: Keeps crashing
comment: Totally unusable!
We have just released a new version that hopefully fixes the crashes on Samsung devices, please give it another try.

title: Galaxy s4
comment: Love the concept of blippex but would like to use it tho. Crashes as soon as it starts to search, would love this search engine to go beyond that of google. Will rate 5 stars as soon as I can search ok.
The new version (1.0.3) should fix these crashes, please try it :)

title: Love the idea
comment: Love the dwell factor concept.How about a widget guys? Would definitely increase the usability.
Crashes every single time on Samsung Note 8" tablet.

HI Rajendra,

Hi Graham, i am Max Kossatz, co-founder & CEO of Blippex, thank you for testing Blippex! I would love to know what happened so that we can fix this, we don't see any crashes in the Playstore crashlog, would it be possible that you can explain it to me via email? My email is mk@archify.com Thank you very much, Max

title: awesome idea
comment: awesome indexing concept. the app is decent. i'm looking forward to having more people use it to improve the indexing.

title: Crashes
comment: On sam note 2
